channel.title: How do i make npc say someones offline?
channel.description: ok i am using source phonescape and i want to make a npc say my friend is offline/online can someone give me the piece i need to do that ????

item.title: How do i make npc say someones offline?
item.dc:creator: @eddie1231231 eddie1231231
item.description:
@eddie1231231 wrote:

so what do i do i press ctrol and r and look for ?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 11:01:50 AM[/size][hr]but where i add that on npc handler but on what part?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 11:08:51 AM[/size][hr]dude give me an error on saying offline or online iam online and it said offline!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc say someones offline?

item.title: How do i make npc say someones offline?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[quote=“pur3str pk2, post:2, topic:72381”]Add this at your NPChandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == SpeakingNpcId) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YourName")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "YourName Is Online"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "YourName Is Offline"; } } }[/quote]

That should work, post here if it gives you any problems.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc say someones offline?

item.title: How do i make npc say someones offline?
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

Add this at your NPChandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURNAME")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME(Owner)is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURNAME (Owner) is OFFLINE"; } } }

Read full topic
